items.text: The cool thing about the new Google Recaptcha is that the validation is now completely encapsulated in the widget.
items.href: java - Google reCAPTCHA: How to get user response and validate in the server side? - Stack Overflow

items.text: That means, that the widget will take care of asking questions, validating responses all the way till it determines that a user is actually a human, only then you get a g-recaptcha-response value.
items.href: java - Google reCAPTCHA: How to get user response and validate in the server side? - Stack Overflow

items.text: Anyone with HTTP POST knowledge could put random data inside of the g-recaptcha-response form field, and foll your site to make it think that this field was provided by the google widget.
items.href: java - Google reCAPTCHA: How to get user response and validate in the server side? - Stack Overflow

items.text: But that does not keep your site safe from HTTP client request forgery.
items.href: java - Google reCAPTCHA: How to get user response and validate in the server side? - Stack Overflow
